name: Magic Loops
headline: Program computers with natural language
description:
Magic Loops are the fastest way to automate (almost) anything. By combining generative AI with code, we make it easy for anyone (yes, even non-programmers!) to setup repeatable tasks and automated workflows.

- Want to use ChatGPT to classify new product features from a Close call? 

- Want to receive a text when someone purchases >$1000 from your Shopify store?

- Want to replace your bespoke AWS Lambdas with self-repairing code? 

Build your first Magic Loop today!

founders.name: Adam Williams, Founder
founders.description: Grew Kojo from 1 to 20+ engineers, Seed to Series C, millions in ARR. Created Long Game from scratch to millions in AUM. Built weather data infrastructure for all iPhone and Android phones in the US. Wrote digital logic for two satellite missions (NASA) and a Mars rover (ESA/NASA).

For any birthdays that are two weeks out, use an LLM to suggest a few gift ideas for each person. If there are no birthdays in the next two weeks, just exit. Send me a text message with birthday gift ideas for each person who's birthday is coming up in the next 2 weeks5.0188 runs](https://magicloops.dev/</loop/7e56c24c-c8c4-49cd-b00f-043615a8cd2d/view>)

[Daily Python Ideas in Spanishsend me an email every day at 7 pm starting today, with ideas for Python projects, starting with a basic idea and increasing the complexity each day (consider the idea so it can be finished in one day). When you reach advanced ideas, consider breaking them down into tasks and send a new task each day to complete that day5.0108 runs](https://magicloops.dev/</loop/1295d7d4-3407-41aa-aa6e-63b7b1abc797/view>)
[Amazon Review SummaryEvery day at 9am scrape an amazon reviews link, make sure to remove any URL params using a code block, then scrape the page and return a summary of the reviews5.0103 runs](https://magicloops.dev/</loop/f002b954-7ad6-4c37-a8bb-e8cd559f7746/view>)
[Daily Cat PicEmail me a picture of a cat everyday at 5 PM.5.095 runs](https://magicloops.dev/</loop/b4d4b9a4-2368-410c-aa59-c22e552b9a34/view>)
[Filmibeat Daily Movie ReleasesScrape the following website every day at 7am: https://www.filmibeat.com/top-listing/ott-movie-releases-this-week/?filter_type=releases use an LLM to extract each movie's title, source (e.g. English, Bollywood), platform (e.g. Sony Liv, Netflix) and release date. Then filter the list to movies released today. If no movies are found, exit. Render the movies released today as markdown and send an email5.078 runs](https://magicloops.dev/</loop/499861cf-7ef4-4101-8a3e-8fc9b41d406e/view>)
[Website Scraper APICreate an API that scrapes a website and returns JSON schema representing the website's content. We'll start with Hacker News, but the website should be configurable via the API input5.06 runs](https://magicloops.dev/</loop/b9659f0f-8b4a-42ed-8ff7-d2d7b3957a06/view>)
[Anakin Skywalker SMS BotCreate an SMS bot that lets me talk to Anakin Skywalker from the Clone Wars. Give advice and respond with context-relevant experience from his time training under Jedi Master Obi-wan Kenobia and training with his apprentice Ahsoka Tano. 5.06 runs](https://magicloops.dev/</loop/93e097ce-29f2-4bfa-bdad-1937056aa707/view>)
[AI Summarization APICreate an AI-based summarization API that takes the contents of the API request, and summarizes the output returning JSON with a "summary" key.5.01 runs](https://magicloops.dev/</loop/2a360270-4a6a-4f72-b9a1-cd8fb0b78006/view>)

**Company Overview: Magic Loops**

**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** San Francisco  
**Team Size:** 2  
**YC Batch:** S23  
**Website:** [magicloops.dev](https://magicloops.dev)  

---

**Mission:**  
Magic Loops is on a quest to revolutionize how we engage with computers‚Äîby programming them with natural language. They believe in shaking off the shackles of traditional coding and making automation accessible to everyone, including those who aren't trained programmers.

**What They Do:**  
Initially launched as a tool designed to automate tasks efficiently, Magic Loops marries generative AI with code to help users set up repeatable tasks and workflows with ease. Imagine being able to classify product features from a sales call using ChatGPT or getting instant notifications when a hefty purchase is made on your Shopify store. They offer something truly unique with their platform‚Äîself-repairing code that can replace cumbersome AWS Lambdas.

**Key Features:**
- **Custom API Creation:** You can define your API needs, review the proposals, and activate your Flow with three simple steps.
- **Pre-Built Templates:** Whether you're looking to scrape weather data or automate birthday reminders, they provide a range of templates crafted by users.
- **Diverse Automation Options:** From sending daily emails with cat pictures to summarizing news articles, their platform supports a myriad of smart automations.

**Current Offering:**
Among the many possibilities, users can:
- Create an API for translating user requests into English.
- Generate concise, Twitter-ready updates from merged GitHub pull requests.
- Get daily style advice based on weather conditions in San Francisco.
- Automate birthday gift reminders using a smart logic based on upcoming dates.

**User Base:**
Magic Loops has garnered rapid traction, with over 800,000 Loops executed, benefiting tens of thousands of users. Testimonials highlight its effectiveness, with users expressing surprise at how well it integrates compared to other solutions.

**Pricing:**
Magic Loops opts for transparency in pricing:
- **Free Plan:** Get started with 3,000 credits and access public Loops.
- **Professional Plan:** For $20/month, enjoy 20,000 credits with dedicated support.
- **Enterprise Plan:** Tailored for larger organizations with unlimited credits and custom solutions.

---

In a nutshell, Magic Loops is here to empower anyone looking to introduce a bit of magic into their workflows. By leveraging the capabilities of generative AI, they‚Äôre making the once daunting task of automation not just possible but enjoyable. Dive in and build your first Magic Loop today!
